mapper.select: select e.userid, e.empno, e.ename, e.emptel, d.deptname as deptcode, t.teamname as teamcode, p.posname as poscode from emp e join dept d on e.deptcode = d.deptcode join team t on e.teamcode = t.teamcode join position p on e.poscode = p.poscode where e.userid = #{userid}
select e.userid, e.ename, p.posname as poscode from emp e join position p on e.poscode = p.poscode where e.userid = #{ userid }

select e.userid, e.empno, e.ename, e.emptel, d.deptname as deptcode, t.teamname as teamcode, p.posname as poscode from emp e join dept d on e.deptcode = d.deptcode join team t on e.teamcode = t.teamcode join position p on e.poscode = p.poscode where e.userid != 'admin' and e.EMPAPPROVE !=0 and e.ename like '%${value}%' order by empno

select t.TEAMNAME from emp e join team t on e.TEAMCODE = t.TEAMCODE where userid = #{userid}
